TextBlock.Text: SUTERA: Come in, friends, and let us offer some of our time to our studies of the <color=orange>Eye of the Universe</color>.
SUTERA: Utilize this laboratory while it lasts, for the <color=orange>ring particles</color> may soon <color=orange>bury our whole settlement</color> if these accretion rates keep up.
HOSTA: And what a shame it is. I have already made the necessary preparations to find a <color=orange>more suitable settlement</color>, perhaps <color=orange>around another star</color>.
